channel.title: Trying to add 1 connection per ip limit
channel.description:
Hey, im trying to add the 1 connection for each ip thing. Its the only one in the tutorial thread so if you need to se the tutorial then go there and look.
Ok so i have added everything but when im compiling im getting 2 errors.
this is the error line:
[code]public static List; connections = new ArrayList();[/code]
Here is the errors:
[code]server.java:16 class, interface, or enum expected public static List; connections = new ArrayList()
server.java:16: class, interface, or enum expected public static List; connections = new ArrayList();[/code]
Can anyone help me fixing this?

item.title: Trying to add 1 connection per ip limit
item.dc:creator: @cuz cuz
item.description:
@cuz wrote:

Or you could just open server.java, find:

num > 5

and change it to:

num > 1

Voila, problem solved.

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to add 1 connection per ip limit
